Ksp have so many bugs on xbox and ps4, will there ever be any more update? I want to buy it but seeing its current state, i dont know if i will buy it

Edited April 21, 2020 by Starcatcher

@Starcatcher I have no clue about the status of updates, but I’ve owned the ps4 version since January... while there are a few bugs, here and there, it’s not as bad is you seem to think. I have experienced no game-crippling bugs, and nothing that has really required me to restart the app (I’ve only had one “unexpected error” occur, closing out the game), but nothing significant. The only bug that I’ve really noticed is how you sometimes don’t get credited with a trophy you’ve earned... for example, I just orbited Moho, but didn’t get the trophy for visiting the planet..

 

Admittedly, the controller controls take a LOT to get used to, and there are a lot of “hidden” controls... and since it’s a pc port, that relies on a keyboard and mouse, you can really tell. Also, console part limit is about 100 before you get crazy frame rate drops, but this is a technical limitation and not a bug.

 

I’m curious, what bugs are you referring to? Especially if you don’t have the game...
